agents.name: HubSpot Agent
agents.description: Specialized A2A agent for HubSpot CRM operations. Manages contacts, companies, deals, and marketing automation workflows. Can sync data, generate reports, and execute bulk operations via the HubSpot API.

skills.name: Contact Management
skills.description: Create, update, search, and delete contacts in HubSpot CRM

skills.name: Deal Tracking
skills.description: Manage sales pipeline, track deal stages, and update deal properties

skills.name: Marketing Automation
skills.description: Create and manage email sequences, workflows, and marketing campaigns

skills.name: CRM Reporting
skills.description: Generate sales and marketing reports with custom metrics and visualizations

agents.name: TaxExpert Agent
agents.description: Expert A2A agent for tax-related queries and calculations. Provides guidance on income tax, VAT, corporate tax, and international tax matters. Supports tax planning, compliance checks, and document preparation.

skills.name: Tax Calculation
skills.description: Calculate estimated tax liabilities for individuals and businesses

skills.name: Deduction Finder
skills.description: Identify applicable tax deductions and credits based on financial data

skills.name: Compliance Check
skills.description: Review tax filings for compliance issues and missing requirements

skills.name: Tax Planning
skills.description: Provide strategic tax planning recommendations and optimization strategies

agents.name: RentACar Agent
agents.description: Specialized A2A agent for car rental operations. Handles vehicle reservations, fleet management, pricing, and customer service. Integrates with rental management systems for real-time availability and booking.

skills.name: Vehicle Search
skills.description: Search for available vehicles by location, dates, and vehicle category

skills.name: Booking Management
skills.description: Create, modify, and cancel vehicle reservations

skills.name: Pricing Quote
skills.description: Generate rental quotes with options for insurance, extras, and promotions

skills.name: Fleet Status
skills.description: Check vehicle availability, maintenance schedules, and utilization metrics

skills.name: Customer Support
skills.description: Handle customer inquiries, complaints, and special requests
